Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; division of proceeds of a partnership between a person and Shamash (temple); drawing on left edge; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.244)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
